name: Toree 3D - Jumbled Jam
description:
A small, new game, that takes elements from the original Toree 3D (https://siactro.itch.io/toree3d) and remixes them into four new levels. 

Basically, Kalliros (one of the leveldesigners for both Toree games) was kinda bored during the early stages of Toree 2s development(https://siactro.itch.io/toree-2), so he tried to come up with some new and really outlandish designs and ideas for the the level elements in Toree 3D.

I hope you gonna like it, but I also like to say that those levels will feel different from all the ones in the other two games. Just consider these new levels as the obscure and forgotten Toree 3D romhack.
